choices: A young woman or an older woman
1.content: "Greetings, spectators! Forgive my boastfulness! I am not familar with the manners of mortals from your version of Earth! I am familar with your stories though! I am good friends your dimensions God and his son Jesus, and their mutual partner the Holy Spirit! I love Superman! I love the Christopher Reeves version! The Grant Morrison All Star version! The Alan Moore take! But I know Garth Ennis writes him best of all! Where are my manners! My name is Azrael! I am one of the Powers That Be from the Buffyverse! I am a god myself! The strongest, and most glorious, and most anonymous! Besides Superman, I also love strong women! Why do you think I set up shop in the Buffyverse and not somewhere else?! Anyways, dear mortal reader, on to the story! There are five people to choose from! Each story is wonderful! Read on!
1.title: Azrael is in the house!

choices: Mitch watches the DVD right away
Mitch waits awhile to see the DVD
Mitch rejects the DVD outright, and discards it into the trash
11.content:
"My name's Mitch Maribel, and I'd like to legally change my identity"...

Mitchell Maribel was going through a life crisis. Not a middle aged one, as he was barely in his mid twenties. He sat on his couch, watching a his DVD copy of "Afro Samurai". He was going through issues of malaise. He didn't fit in.

He goes to work. It's seven in the morning when he gets there. Luke Skywalker. Holden Caulfield. Huey Freeman. Peter Petrelli. No, scratch Peter Petrelli. He's a walking idiot ball. These were a few of Mitchell's fictional avatars. People who were utterly bored with their lives. Antoine Doinel. Everything else was a copy of a copy...and so on. Don't want to get sued from copying "Fight Club". But would it matter, really?

That 2:30 feeling Mitchell felt throughout the entire day. He had a brief discussion with his predominantly white co-workers during lunch why black males usually looked better bald. Mitchell was considered the resident expert, as he was both of african descent, and shaved his head.

"Dreadlocks are only good on Jamaican's and girls" said Diana, a twenty year old temp that Mitchell liked.

"I...I mean I don't know. I've never really thought about it. I personally don't like to think about how other males look."

"No homo, am I right?" asked a guy that Mitch didn't like that well, with that motherfucking cocky grin on his face.

"No, not at all" sighed Mitch. "But I don't mean it that way. I just have never thought about it. Samuel L Jackson and Billy Dee Williams I'm assuming are the only people that might be the Gen X exception's to the rule, I suppose."

"What about..."

But Mitch got up from the semi circle desk where everyone was chatting, and decided to take an early day. He had enough idle pop culture musings as it was at home, where he could converse in privacy to his internet message board friends.

"That dude cut me off", replied Daniel, the man with the shit eating grin.

"Mitch isn't that athletic anyway" said another woman named Alexis. "You can only pull off the bald and black look if you're properly jacked, or properly bulky like Ving Rhames. Hey remember when he gave his award to Jack Lemmon?"

"Oh yeah" said someone else.

Meanwhile, Mitchell got home. He collected the mail from his mailbox situated right near the door, when he saw a DVD in a transparent slip cover that had his name on it and was marked as "important".
11.title: An adult man

choices: Clarence is interested and opens it.
Clarence is skeptical and doesn't know if he should open the DVD
12.content:
Clarence Baccay is your typical teenage boy...yadda yadda yadda. Truth be told, Clarence didn't really find his life interesting enough to talk about. The only things he had going for him was that he used to be an orphan who was lovingly adopted at age one and a half by a caring family, and that he was relatively bright. He was able to get into university a year ahead of time at age sixteen to study chemical engineering. He was good looking too, nothing to sneeze at, but sadly not a head turner, especially considering that his school work took up most of his time. Clarence's adopted parents tried the best they could to avoid being too helicopter-y and clingy, but their best efforts turned into bad intentions early in Clarence's life, and he was somewhat socially awkward. Not a dork, but he had been accused of being autistic by his fellow school-mates right to his face on at least two occasions. He was taking the metro home today. He could have lifted a ride from one of his engineering pals, or better yet, convince his parents to spring for a car or least an advance until he finds a comfortable job, but for some reason Clarence felt that he was comfortable with this type of transport.

He got home slightly late, around 4:30 PM, and his parents weren't home. His cell phone showed a message from his dad that both him and Clarence's mother would be home around 7:00, family emergency. The memo did not state what member of the family was in danger, or how.

Clarence was bemused though, most of all, to find the mail just laying about near the telephone in the hallway. He picked them up to analyze the letters. Mostly stuff for his parents. Clarence didn't have any credit card soliciters, his mom and dad threw all of those out sight unseen, and he didn't know anyone, even among his family, who would contact him via "snail mail". The very last item in the pile was a DVD with Clarence's full name on the cover of the disc jacket.

"TO: CLARENCE ELROY BACCAY-OPEN ASAP"
12.title: A teenage boy

121.content:
Curious Clarence opens it up and sees a disc with his named written in pen on it, holding it in his hand he walks to his DVD Player, turn’s it and the tv on and inserts the disc in, hearing the sound of the DVD player Processing the Disc before the TV screen Changed to a colour background.

“Greeting Clarence!” a female voice shouted at him startling him “you have been chosen to receive powers worthy of god” all Clarence did was think of this as some kind of joke “now I know what you’re thinking *this must be some kind of joke* well… you’ll just have to see for yourself but back onto the topic there are a few guidelines to this”.

“First is that by gaining god like powers and none of the weaknesses you become one of the hot girls that will be presented to you later but if the current girl doesn’t suit your taste you can change to a different one”.

“Seconded is that you will travel to any time period around the world, but you can’t remain in this timeline for more than a day which can only be used to play this tape again if you wish to change looks”.

“Third anything you do while as the selected woman in anytime will sometimes change the course of history and the world around you but you can of course reset everything back to normal by inserting this disc again into the tv and selecting reset or Changing into a different woman”.

“Forth, you are indestructible and immortal, so bullets, bombs, even impalement or decapitation won’t kill you” .

“your powers are unlimited and can range from anything go nut as you don’t have any weaknesses to boot for example, laser eye’s, flying, super speed, x-ray vision, etc”.

“Now that we’re clear on the rules here’s your first option”.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/ori...

“You can select a different woman to become, there are many options to pick, have fun”.

Looking at the woman before him on the screen, he grabbed his remote and selected_.
121.title: Clarence is interested and opens it.

info.brief_description: The chance of a lifetime. Immortality, indestructibility, and a vast array of  powers.
info.description:
You are anonymously given a DVD through the mail. After sorting through the other mail, you let curiousity get the best of you, and you decide to put it in and watch it, especially when you saw that the disc was marked with your name on it and that it was important to watch. When the film appears, a god like being from "another reality entirely" tells you that you have been randomly selected to become the first superhuman being in your dimension. You'll be given all the powers of the comic book character Superman, with none of his weaknesses to boot, and everlasting immortality. You somehow know that he isn't lying. But there is a twist. You will instantly upon getting these powers become a beautiful young woman.

Thanks to the Comic Book Rumbles forum on Comic Book Resources for the thread that inspired this story.
